name: WordPress Heading
author: SOFTINTTECH

sections.description:
WordPress Heading Plugin lets you to Display Superb Coloured Style Heading Bar with the Help of Shortcodes.

Usage:
You can Add New Stylish Heading with the Help of Button in Visual Editor.

WordPress Heading Plugin lets you to Display Superb Coloured Style Heading Bar with the Help of Shortcodes. It shows the Different Between the Normal Paragraphs and Heading. It wont Affect your SEO.

  • You Can Choose your Own Color
  • Full Featured Control Panel
  • Responsive & Very Flexible
  • Works with All themes

If you Have Any Questions Related in this Plugin Please Use the WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.

Usage

You can Add New Stylish Heading with the Help of Button in Visual Editor
sections.installation:
Upload the soft_heading folder to the /wp-content/plugins/directory

Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What is the use of this plugin?

This Plugin Helps you to Display a Superb, Nice Looking Heading Bar.

This Plugin is Responsive

Yes, Ofcourse this Plugin is Made with Responsive in Mind.

Does this plugin support all themes?

Yes, absolutely it support all the WordPress themes. If you didn’t work on your theme just inform us. We’ll help to resolve it the next version and we’ll update it.

Does it affect your plugin and themes?

No, it doesn’t affect your plugin and themes. It a very light weighted plugin and doesn’t affect other files and codes on your site. So you don’t have to worry about your themes or plugins after installing this plugin.

What about support?

I am constantly improving this plugin. So you won’t find much errors. If you want to file a support ticket then just create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will work on that issues as fast as I can and get the better results for you.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Minor Bug Fixes
  • Added Visual Editor Button for Inserting New Heading
  • You can Directly access Plugin Settings page after installing the plugin.

1.1

  • Minor Bug Fixes

1.0

  • Initial release
